abstract: Is there any way to import the old messages from both my expiring college account and Hotmail into a new Gmail account — besides forwarding each one individually?
snippet: Is there any way to import the old messages from both my expiring college account and Hotmail into a new Gmail account — besides forwarding each one individually?
lead_paragraph: Q. Is there any way to import the old messages from both my expiring college account and Hotmail into a new Gmail account  besides forwarding each one individually?
